sect2.title: Layers to Top

indexterm.tertiary: Move selected layers to the top of stack

sect2.para: The Layers to Top command raises the selected layers to the top of the layer stack. If the selected layers already start at the top, or if there is only one layer, this menu entry is disabled.

listitem.para:
From the main menu through
Layer Stack Layers to Top .
By pressing the Shift key and clicking on the up-arrow icon at the bottom of the Layers dialog.
